rooms.description: Open-plan living space integrated with the kitchen for seamless flow.
Modern open plan kitchen adjoining the living area.
Spacious bedroom with a private balcony oriented towards the north for enhanced Vastu compliance and light.
Comfortable bedroom with its own balcony ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to the north as per traditional design requirements.
Two-car garage providing sufficient space for vehicles with easy access from the exterior.
